trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of items in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
The collection is accessed from the parent control, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>, by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 從父控制項、 存取集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>、 藉由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To create a collection of objects to display in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control, you can add or remove the items individually by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的物件顯示集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控制項，您可以新增或移除的項目個別使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> and checks every other item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>和檢查清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count%2A> of items.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count%2A>的項目。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> methods to set the check state of an item.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>設定項目的核取狀態的方法。

trans-unit.source: For every other item that is to be checked, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> is called to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> to `Indeterminate`, while <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> is called on the other item to set the checked state to `Checked`.
trans-unit.target: 每個其他項目，將檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>呼叫以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>至`Indeterminate`，雖然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>已檢查的狀態設定為其他項目上呼叫`Checked`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> that owns the collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> class.
Adds an item to the list of items for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
An object representing the item to add to the collection.
<see langword="true" /> to check the item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Adds an item to the list of items for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />, specifying the object to add and whether it is checked.
The index of the newly added item.
This method adds an item to the list.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將項目加入清單。

trans-unit.source: For a list, the item is added to the end of the existing list of items.
trans-unit.target: 如需清單，項目會加入至現有的項目清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: For a sorted checked list box, the item is inserted into the list according to its sorted position.
trans-unit.target: 針對已排序的檢查的清單方塊中，項目會插入至根據排序的位置清單。

trans-unit.source: A `SystemException` occurs if there is insufficient space available to store the new item.
trans-unit.target: A`SystemException`如果空間不足，無法儲存新的項目就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ThreeDCheckBoxes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ThreeDCheckBoxes%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example populates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> with controls and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會填入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控制項與集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> named CheckedListBox1 and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例時，將下列程式碼貼中表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>CheckedListBox1 和呼叫名為`InitializeCheckListBox`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the item to add to the collection.
The initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> for the checked portion of the item.
Adds an item to the list of items for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />, specifying the object to add and the initial checked value.
The index of the newly added item.
This method adds an item to the checked list box.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法中加入核取的清單方塊項目。

trans-unit.source: For an unsorted checked list box, the item is added to the end of the existing list of items.
trans-unit.target: 對於未排序的核取的清單方塊中，項目就會加入至現有的項目清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: For a sorted checked list box, the item is inserted into the list according to its sorted position.
trans-unit.target: 針對已排序的檢查的清單方塊中，項目會插入至根據排序的位置清單。

trans-unit.source: A `SystemException` occurs if there is insufficient space available to store the new item.
trans-unit.target: A`SystemException`如果空間不足，無法儲存新的項目就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="check" /> parameter is not one of the valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> values.
